title: Does the Samsung Galaxy A21s support 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: okay kind visitors you are on the right place for your answer. do you know 5g is an old technology for japan’. but india is new to it so replying you is more easier. only lg and iqqo has releasd 5g in india but newcommer is mi 10 5g so as a point to notice.samsung is still behind!!!! but with a 5g modem you can run 5g on any device. for more such topic join CROSSfadesquare community.quora
